CustomField.formula: IF( (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Animal' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Crop' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Livestock' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BusinessOperation'), RecordType.DeveloperName, CASE( TEXT(vlocity_ins__Type__c) , 'Recreational Vehicle', 'AntiqueClassicVehicle', 'Single Family Home', 'Home', 'Multi-Family Home', 'Home', 'Condominium', 'Home', 'Commercial - Office', 'CommercialProperty', 'Commercial - Warehouse', 'CommercialProperty', 'Commercial - Storefront', 'CommercialProperty', 'Commercial - Garage', 'CommercialProperty', 'Business - Owned', 'Business', 'Business - Leased', 'Business', 'Outbuilding', 'Home', 'Houseboat', 'Boat', 'Company', 'CommercialProperty', 'Fishing Boat', 'Boat', 'Pleasure Boat', 'Boat', 'Trailer', 'MobileHome', 'Scheduled Personal Property', 'Other', TEXT(vlocity_ins__Type__c)))
CustomField.label: Image Type
